column5: The furnishings are all new, nothing in the house was someones excess furniture. Enjoy the new beds and mattresses, the quality sheets and towels and all new dishware in the kitchen.  The home is right off the highway and close to new shopping, food and entertainment. 1 exit south lies the Cedar Park Event center where you can see a concert as well as minor league hockey and basketball  The movie theatre is less than 2 miles away as is Great shopping; Dicks Sporting Goods, Wholefoods and FOOD!
column8: The Leander Chateau, close to everything
